snippet: The move comes a year after a zoo in Copenhagen generated global outrage when it killed a healthy giraffe, before dissecting him and feeding him to lions.
abstract: Danish zoo dissects lion corpse before public audience, including children, provoking outrage on social media; zoo official defends educational value for watchers and country's distinctively pragmatic, less emotional approach to zoo animal welfare.
lead_paragraph: The move comes a year after a zoo in Copenhagen generated global outrage when it killed a healthy giraffe, before dissecting him and feeding him to lions.

headline.main: Zoo’s Public Dissection of Lion Makes Denmark Again a Target of Outrage
headline.print_headline: Zoo Dissects Lion in Public in Denmark, Stirring Anger

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: European Assn of Zoos and Aquaria

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: People for the Ethical Treatment of Animals
